text: Nye Frank is an American dragster builder in the 1960s and 1970s.Taylor, Thom. "Beauty Beyond the Twilight Zone", in Hot Rod, April 2017, pp.30-43. Among others, Frank worked on the twin-engined dragsters Freight Train and Pulsator (as designerTaylor, Thom. "Pulsator Twin Engine Dragster", in "Beauty Beyond the Twilight Zone", p.36.) the Setzer streamliner (designing and positioning the wingsTaylor, Thom. "Barry Setzer Monocoque Streamliner", in "Beauty Beyond the Twilight Zone", p.40.), Flying Wedge (building the body, along with Quin EpperlyTaylor, Thom. "Prudhomme Flying Wedge", in "Beauty Beyond the Twilight Zone", p.37.), and Spirit II (collaborating in building her with Craig BreedloveTaylor, Thom. "Breedlove Spirit II", in "Beauty Beyond the Twilight Zone", p.34.). ==Notes== ==Sources== *Taylor, Thom. "Beauty Beyond the Twilight Zone" in Hot Rod, April 2017, pp.30-43. Category: American automobile designers Category:drag racing
title: Nye Frank
